Package ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook

Class GradeBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.cjvth.gradebook.GradeBook
  • public class GradeBook
extends java.lang.Object
    A record book for students. Supports adding and changing semester grades and calculating some statistics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  GradeBook.GradeType
      Type of evaluating the student's achievements: GradeBook.GradeType.BOOL_CREDIT, GradeBook.GradeType.DIFFERENTIATED_CREDIT, GradeBook.GradeType.EXAM.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GradeBook

        public GradeBook​(int id,
                 int totalSemesters)
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - the grade book's identification number
        totalSemesters - positive number of semesters that the student will is supposed to attend

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Get the id of the book.
        Returns:
        the id

      • getTotalSemestersCount

        public int getTotalSemestersCount()
        Get the number of semesters that the student is supposed to attend in total.
        Returns:
        the id of the book

      • addSubject

        public void addSubject​(int semester,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       GradeBook.GradeType gradeType)
        Add a subject to receive a grade in certain semester. You can have multiple subject with certain title only in different semesters, also you can have different grade types for one subject
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        title - name of the subject
        gradeType - method of getting the mark from GradeBook.GradeType
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if subject with this title already exists in this semester or if such semester does not exist

      • removeSubject

        public void removeSubject​(int semester,
                          java.lang.String title)
        Remove subject in certain semester. If there is no such subject, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        title - name of the subject
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if semester number is illegal

      • getSubjects

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSubjects​(int semester)
        Get list of subjects in certain semester.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        Returns:
        set of subject names
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if semester number is illegal

      • getMark

        public java.lang.Integer getMark​(int semester,
                                 java.lang.String title)
        Get the mark for subject if it is set.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        title - name of the subject
        Returns:
        mark value if it is set or null if it isn't
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if subject with this title at this semester does not exist

      • setMark

        public void setMark​(int semester,
                    java.lang.String title,
                    int mark)
        Put or change mark for previously added subject.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        title - name of the subject
        mark - the mark, should be either 0 or 1 for GradeBook.GradeType.BOOL_CREDIT grade type or from 0 to 5 for GradeBook.GradeType.DIFFERENTIATED_CREDIT and GradeBook.GradeType.EXAM
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if subject with this title at this semester does not exist; or if mark is out of bounds for its grade type

      • unsetMark

        public void unsetMark​(int semester,
                      java.lang.String title)
        Remove mark for previously added subject. Does nothing if there is no mark.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        title - name of the subject
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if subject with this title at this semester does not exist

      • getGradeType

        public GradeBook.GradeType getGradeType​(int semester,
                                        java.lang.String title)
        Remove mark for previously added subject. Does nothing if there is no mark.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        title - name of the subject
        Returns:
        type of the grade from GradeBook.GradeType
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if subject with this title at this semester does not exist

      • meanSemesterMark

        public java.lang.Double meanSemesterMark​(int semester)
        Get mean mark value for certain semester. Unset marks are ignored.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester
        Returns:
        the mean mark of subjects with mark in the semester or null if no subjects have mark
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if semester number is illegal

      • meanMark

        public java.lang.Double meanMark()
        Get mean mark value across all semesters. Unset marks are ignored.
        Returns:
        the mean mark of subjects with mark for all time or null if no subjects have mark

      • semesterStipend

        public int semesterStipend​(int semester)
        Get what government academic stipend the student should be given in the next semester after the given one.
        Parameters:
        semester - number of the semester, based on which marks the student is going to get stipend in the next semester
        Returns:
        0 of none, 1 if normal, 2 if increased, -1 if not enough information to know
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if semester number is illegal
